means: 使（自己或他人）卷入纠纷

sentence.Network_en: Any hostilities could result in retaliation and further embroil U.N. troops in fighting.
sentence.Network_cn: 任何敌对行为都可能招致报复，进而使联合国部队卷入战斗。

sentence.Network_en: If time grew, probable meeting embroil arrives pupil, cause blindness!
sentence.Network_cn: 假如时间长了, 很可能会牵连到瞳孔, 造成失明!

PerfectNetExp.abs: 大学英语精读第6册 ... elsewhere 在别处 embroil 使卷入, 牵连, 使纠缠 embryo 胚胎, 胎儿, 胚芽//.
gre词汇精选（最新词汇） - 豆丁网 ... embodiment 化身，体现 embroil 牵连，卷入纠纷 embryonic 胚胎的；萌芽期的.
英语构词法记忆单词研究 ... embrace 拥抱,包含,接受 embroil 使混乱 empathy 共感,神入.
大学英语精读第6册 ... elsewhere 在别处 embroil 使卷入, 牵连, 使纠缠 embryo 胚胎, 胎儿, 胚芽//.

list.abs: Mr White got embroiled in that political conspiracy ., 怀特先生被卷进了那起政治阴谋.
If time grew , probable meeting embroil arrives pupil , cause blindness !, 假如时间长了 , 很可能会牵连到瞳孔 , 造成失明!
the man became embroiled this time with a saleswoman ., 这回那男子跟一名女售货员好上了.
If time grew , probable meeting embroil arrives pupil , cause blindness !, 假如时间长了 , 很可能会牵连到瞳孔 , 造成失明!

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from French embrouiller 'to muddle'

entry.tran: 使卷入，使陷入（战斗、争论等）
entry.def: If someone embroils you in a fight or an argument, they get you deeply involved in it.

example.ex: Any hostilities could result in retaliation and further embroil U.N. troops in fighting.
example.tran: 任何敌对行为都可能招致报复，进而使联合国部队卷入战斗。

means.word_mean: 1. force into some kind of situation, condition, or course of action;

sentences.sentence: "They were swept up by the events"

means.word_mean: 使(自己或他人)卷入纠纷

sentences.en: John and Peter were quarrelling, but Mary refused to get embroiled.
sentences.cn: 约翰和彼得在争吵, 但玛丽不愿卷入。
